channel.title: Forums vote
channel.description: I'm trying to add a like vote system to my forums i already have a vote page and everything i just wanna make it kinda like this [IMG]http://i1010.photobucket.com/albums/af223/alexman42/Untitled.png[/img] i was wondering if someone could send me a link to a tut on how to do this or explain to me how to. Thanks idk if this is the right section so plz no flame :\

item.title: Forums vote
item.dc:creator: @Puger12345 Puger12345
item.description:
@Puger12345 wrote:

ya is there a tut on how i can make my vote thing like this or do i just gotta code it? it would be easyer with a tut but w.e :\

Read full topic

item.title: Forums vote
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

It’s actually currently impossible for you to know whether or not someone voted for your server on the MoparScape server status page, they probably just record whether you click that button or not and forward you there, but after that there is no way for them to tell if you voted or not.

Read full topic

item.title: Forums vote
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

Linking it is the easy part, which I can help you with if you want, but I would not be able to do the reward system.

Read full topic
